original_title: El Cabaret de los Hombres Perdidos
overview: The story takes place in El Caberet de los Hombres Perdidos, a sleazy bar in the red light district. One night, Dicky, hiding from a gang chasing him, enters the bar to find and escape his destiny. With humor and wit both sharp and cruel, the authors depict this boy struggling to twist his fate.
title: El Cabaret de los Hombres Perdidos
